articles.title: James Hagens wins Beanpot MVP as Bruins prospects thrive in tournament
articles.description:
"It’s not only that he’s creating chances and getting his points – we know he can do that – he’s really much more well-rounded now."

The post James Hagens wins Beanpot MVP as Bruins prospects thrive in tournament appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: James Hagens was named Beanpot MVP on February 10, 2026.
Bruins prospects showcased strong performances, enhancing local hockey talent visibility.
Increased excitement for Bruins fans as future players excel in competitive tournaments.

articles.title: Patriots CB Carlton Davis shares his pitch to free agents ahead of busy offseason
articles.description:

summary: Patriots CB Carlton Davis promotes team culture to attract free agents this offseason.

Increased talent could enhance the Patriots' competitiveness for Boston fans in 2024.

articles.title: Sticker shock for a dealer’s quote to replace a starter
articles.description:
John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, hears from a reader who got a higher-than-expected quote for a new starter.

The post Sticker shock for a dealer’s quote to replace a starter appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: AAA Northeast's Car Doctor addresses high starter replacement costs for Boston drivers.
One reader reported a dealer quote exceeding $1,000 for a starter replacement.
Residents may face increased repair costs, affecting local vehicle maintenance budgets.

articles.title: Super Bowl averages 124.9 million US viewers, Bad Bunny’s halftime 128.2 million, both short of records
articles.description:
Seattle's 29-13 victory over New England averaged 124.9 million viewers on NBC, Peacock, Telemundo, NBC Sports Digital, and NFL+, according to Nielsen's Big Data + Panel rating system.

The post Super Bowl averages 124.9 million US viewers, Bad Bunny’s halftime 128.2 million, both short of records appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Super Bowl LVIII drew 124.9 million viewers across multiple platforms on February 10, 2026.
Bad Bunny's halftime show attracted 128.2 million viewers, surpassing the game audience.
New England's loss to Seattle may impact local fan engagement and viewership trends.

articles.title: Where will Kristian Campbell play in the field for the Red Sox in 2026?
articles.description:
“If we get this [offense] back, we can find at-bats. That’s his tool — offense."

summary: Kristian Campbell is expected to enhance the Red Sox's offense in 2026.
Manager Alex Cora emphasizes Campbell's offensive skills as crucial for team success.
Boston residents can anticipate increased excitement at Fenway Park with Campbell's contributions.

articles.title: Jayson Tatum remains noncommittal about returning this season for Celtics
articles.description:
"It was the next step. Doesn’t mean that I’m coming back or I’m not. It’s just following the plan."

The post Jayson Tatum remains noncommittal about returning this season for Celtics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum is uncertain about returning to the Celtics this season due to an Achilles injury.
Tatum stated, 'It’s just following the plan,' without a clear timeline for his return.
His absence could significantly affect the Celtics' playoff chances in the upcoming games.

articles.title: Mass. Education Secretary Patrick Tutwiler to step down in latest departure from Healey cabinet
articles.description:
Gov. Maura Healey appointed Salem Schools Superintendent Stephen Zrike to take over after Patrick Tutwiler's three-year tenure.

The post Mass. Education Secretary Patrick Tutwiler to step down in latest departure from Healey cabinet appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts Education Secretary Patrick Tutwiler resigns after three years in office.
Governor Maura Healey appoints Salem Schools Superintendent Stephen Zrike as his replacement.
Tutwiler's departure may affect ongoing education initiatives in Boston schools.
